channel.title: papers on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in papers on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: ongoing projects
item.description: my current researches are: Cavicchia, C., Vichi, M. and Zaccaria, G. Hierarchical Disjoint Principal Component Analysis a new methodology which extends the Disjoint Principal Component Analysis (DPCA) to find out about different grades of syntheses, from the lowest level of the hierarchy upwards, it is formulated in a semi-parametric least-squares framework. (Revision requested) Cavicchia, C and Sarnacchiaro, P. A new ranking calculation based on a composite indicator model: the case of the top 20 European football teams

item.title: publications
item.description: refereed journal articles Cavicchia, C., Vichi, M. and Zaccaria, G. Gaussian mixture model with an extended ultrametric covariance structure Advances in Data Analysis and Classification, (2021) Cavicchia, C. and Sarnacchiaro, P. The effect of a new e-tivity on students’ performance and satisfaction in an online course Statistica Applicata - Italian Journal of Applied Statistics, 33 (2), pp.163-175 (2021) Cavicchia, C. and Vichi, M. Second-order Disjoint Factor Analysis
